attributes.action: Make fishing in Central Park lake a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details:
Sea vets in moreton have the swans 
And will be intouch with rspca 
No one in the park staff would help 
They told me to throw the swan over the wall so they could dispose of it 
We both said no and took it to the vets with the one that was injured someone had to go in the lake to get the dead swan baby out and another had to catch injured I had to carry the dead baby swan
attributes.background: 2 swans were hurt and killed with fishing wire just left in the lake. One drowned and the other is injured due to the fishing wire wrapped around its leg and cut into it. Rspca didn’t bother comming out they were no help

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local parks are the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
